verbs.description: Robert De Niro definitely [V: did] n't hold back on his thoughts about President Donald Trump on Sunday at the Tony Awards in New York City .

[ARG0: Robert De Niro] [ARGM-ADV: definitely] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: hold] back [ARG1: on his thoughts about President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-LOC: at the Tony Awards in New York City] .
